title: How to Make Eggnog Bread

steps.headline: Sift the flour, salt, baking powder, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a medium bowl.
Melt the butter completely.
steps.description: You can use a microwave or saucepan to achieve this.

steps.headline: Combine the melted butter and eggnog in a large bowl.
steps.description: Use a whisk to mix well.

steps.headline: Add the egg, sugar, and extracts to the mixture.
Whisk in the flour mixture, just until combined, but not thoroughly.
Fold in the nuts into the bowl.
Pour the mixture into a pre-greased loaf pan.
Bake for 1 hour, or until golden brown.

text: Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Sift the flour, salt, baking powder, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a medium bowl. Set aside. Melt the butter completely. You can use a microwave or saucepan to achieve this. Combine the melted butter and eggnog in a large bowl. Use a whisk to mix well. Add the egg, sugar, and extracts to the mixture. Continue whisking. Whisk in the flour mixture, just until combined, but not thoroughly.  Fold in the nuts into the bowl.  Pour the mixture into a pre-greased loaf pan.  Bake for 1 hour, or until golden brown.
